Package: grails.plugin.cache.web

[Java] Class GenericResponseWrapper

        • grails.plugin.cache.web.GenericResponseWrapper
        • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
          java.io.Serializable

          @java.lang.SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
public class GenericResponseWrapper
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper

          Provides a wrapper for javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper.

          It is used to wrap the real Response so that we can modify it after that the target of the request has delivered its response.

          It uses the Wrapper pattern.

          Based on net.sf.ehcache.constructs.web.GenericResponseWrapper.
          Authors:
          Greg Luck
          Burt Beckwith

            • @java.lang.Overridede public public void sendError(int code, java.lang.String string)

              Send the error. If the response is not ok, most of the logic is bypassed and the error is sent raw Also, the content is not cached.

              throws:
              IOException IOException
              Parameters:
              code - the status code
              string - the error message

            • @java.lang.Overridede public public void sendRedirect(java.lang.String string)

              Send the redirect. If the response is not ok, most of the logic is bypassed and the error is sent raw. Also, the content is not cached.

              throws:
              IOException IOException
              Parameters:
              string - the URL to redirect to
